TRANSACTION.TITLE: 代收用户供热退费
TRANSACTION.VARIABLE:
<ITEM NAME="#TX_TYPE"	TYPE="%-2s" 	 FUNCTIONS="""/> 
	
 
	
	
  

		
		 "{
				//核心查询柜员是否签到
				dim @info as string;
				dim @tmpcsts as string;
				refresh();
				
				initfd();
				commsend_001();
				$FD16='9598';
				$FD123='select csts from com_tel where tel='+chr(39)+$FD7+chr(39);
				@info=callserver();
				
				if($FD12!='0000')
				{
				    showmsg(geterror());
				    return(false);
				}
				
				@tmpcsts=delspace(strfld(@info,'|',0));
				if(@tmpcsts!='0')
				{
				    showmsg('柜员尚未签到不可进行缴费,请先签到!!');
				    return(false);
				}
			 	
			 
	      initfd();
	      commsend_001();
				$FD16='3369';                   //退费需要授权
				callserver();
				if($FD12 !='0000')
	      {
					showmsg(geterror());
					return(false);
				}
			 
				initfd();
				commsend_002(); 
				$FD16='2100';
				$FD30=#USR_NO;
				$FD34=#YEAR;
				$FD28=#OLD_DATE;
				$FD32=#OLD_TRACENO;
				$FD82=#REASON;                  //退费原因
				$FD60='RYGR';
				$FD44=itoa(#OLD_AMT,'%-16.2f'); //交易金额
				callagnpt();
				if($FD12!='0000')
				{
				  showmsg(geterror());
				  return(false);
				}
	
				#YHNO_2=$FD30;
				#YHNAME_2=$FD25;
				#ADDRESS_2=$FD26;
				#YEAR_2=$FD34;
				#MONTH_2=$FD35;
				#FWMJ_2=val($FD84);
				#MJDJ_2=val($FD85);
				#MJYS_2=val($FD97);
				#JLDJ_2=val($FD94);
				#JLYL_2=val($FD39);
				#JLYS_2=val($FD40);
				#YSBJ_2=val($FD41);
				#JMJE_2=val($FD42);
				#YHJE_2=val($FD43);
				#AMT_2=val($FD44);
				#BZ_2=$FD81;
				#STAT=$FD20;
				#TRACE_NO=$FD27;
				#JFDATE=$FD45;
				#AC_NO=$FD31;
				#AC_NAME=$FD33;
				#TX_TYPE=$FD67;
				runoutput();
				rerun();	     
		  }"
